predictions.text: Cboe VIX will close at or above 20.0 on at least one trading day by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any official Cboe VIX close >= 20.0 as shown on cboe.com or major market data providers by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Move Index spikes spilling into equities
predictions.rationale: Post-rally complacency and dense Jan event risk raise odds of a brief volatility spike.

predictions.text: U.S. Unemployment Rate (seasonally adjusted) for December 2025 will print between 3.6% and 4.0%.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS Employment Situation news release Table A-1 shows the total unemployment rate in [3.6%, 4.0%].
monitoring_signals: Household survey employment and participation shifts
Challenger job cuts and Indeed postings
predictions.rationale: Labor market is easing gradually, but still near full employment.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI (headline, MoM, seasonally adjusted) for December 2025 will print between -0.1% and +0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI-U headline month-over-month percent change falls within [-0.1%, +0.3%] in the official release.
monitoring_signals: Gasoline prices (AAA, EIA) and used car auction prices (Manheim MMR)
predictions.rationale: Cooling core goods, moderating shelter, and softer energy keep headline contained.

predictions.text: The FOMC will cut the federal funds target range by 25 bps at its January 2026 meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: Federal Reserve statement and implementation note show a 25 bp reduction in the target range versus the prior meeting.
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and SEP path relative to market pricing
OIS and Fed funds futures pricing shifts
predictions.rationale: Disinflation momentum and softening growth raise odds of an early follow-on cut.

predictions.text: OFAC will announce at least one Russia-related sanctions designation via a U.S. Treasury press release by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A press release on home.treasury.gov explicitly lists Russia-related designations before 2026-01-01 UTC.
monitoring_signals: Arms procurement and evasion networks exposure
predictions.rationale: Ongoing conflict and evasion crackdowns make additional year-end designations likely.

predictions.text: Freddie Mac PMMS 30-year fixed mortgage rate will print at or below 6.25% in at least one weekly survey by 2026-01-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Freddie Mac Primary Mortgage Market Survey shows the 30-year fixed rate <= 6.25% in any weekly release by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: MBS current coupon yields and spreads
Fed communication on balance sheet and policy path
predictions.rationale: Falling Treasury yields and tighter MBS spreads should filter into mortgage rates.

predictions.text: CISA will add at least 10 new CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) Catalog in January 2026.
predictions.verification_criteria: The KEV Catalog shows at least 10 CVEs with January 2026 add dates.
monitoring_signals: Threat intel reports on in-the-wild exploits
predictions.rationale: Zero-day and n-day exploitation cadence remains elevated; CISA routinely updates KEV monthly.

predictions.text: Apple will publish a January 2026 macOS security update acknowledging at least one vulnerability that "may have been actively exploited."
predictions.verification_criteria: Apple Security Updates page for macOS in Jan 2026 includes wording indicating at least one actively exploited vulnerability.
monitoring_signals: Security vendor reports (Project Zero, Kaspersky, Citizen Lab)
CISA KEV additions referencing Apple CVEs
predictions.rationale: Apple frequently patches actively exploited issues shortly after discovery, often across iOS and macOS.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or above $95,000 on at least one UTC day by 2026-03-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: A print >= $95,000 on reputable consolidated feeds (e.g., CoinDesk BPI, CoinMarketCap) during any UTC day by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Spot BTC ETF net flows and AUM
predictions.rationale: Liquidity tailwinds and ETF adoption could propel a late-cycle extension, but volatility is high.

predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will report at least one S2 (Moderate) Solar Radiation Storm by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: SWPC event reports or alerts show an S2 (or higher) Solar Radiation Storm classification within the period.
monitoring_signals: Solar cycle 25 sunspot number and 10.7 cm flux
predictions.rationale: High solar activity increases probability of radiation storms through early 2026.

predictions.text: U.S. Retail Sales (Advance, total, MoM, SA) for December 2025 will print between -0.2% and +0.6%.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Census Bureau Advance Monthly Retail Trade report shows total retail and food services MoM percent change within [-0.2%, +0.6%].
monitoring_signals: Consumer sentiment and real income growth
predictions.rationale: Holiday demand is mixed; lower gas prices and easing rates support modest growth.

predictions.text: USD/JPY spot will trade at or below 138.00 on at least one UTC day by 2026-03-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any reputable FX data source (e.g., Refinitiv, Bloomberg, Investing.com) shows a spot print <= 138.00 during the period.
monitoring_signals: Japan wage/price data and Shunto outcomes
U.S. inflation surprises and Fed path
predictions.rationale: Narrowing rate differentials and BoJ normalization raise downside risks for USD/JPY.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude front-month futures will settle at or below $70.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: ICE Brent front-month official settlement price <= $70.00/bbl on any trading day by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: A growth scare or inventory builds could trigger a temporary downside overshoot despite OPEC+ efforts.
